item.title: Bluesky hits 40 million users, introduces ‘dislikes’ beta
item.description: Bluesky is looking to a new signal — "dislikes" — to personalize users' feeds.

item.title: Meta bought 1 GW of solar this week
item.description: The social media company inked three deals in the U.S. to power its data centers and offset its carbon footprint.

item.title: AI mania tanks CoreWeave’s Core Scientific acquisition; it buys Python notebook Marimo
item.description: CoreWeave's failed buy of Core Scientific is another sign of an AI bubble. But it's still shopping.

item.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot
item.description: A timeline of ChatGPT product updates and releases, starting with the latest, which we’ve been updating throughout the year.

item.title: Tattd gave four TechCrunch writers tattoos at Startup Battlefield
item.description: Tattd, a marketplace for tattoo-seekers and artists, set up a mini tattoo parlor in the Expo Hall at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025.
